Field.Label: Almanac information available to all Weather Underground plans (Stratus, Cumulus, Anvil)

Field.tooltip: Please enter the desired location information for this device. It must follow the format of the examples below.
Field.Label: Location:
Enter the observation location. Locations must follow one of the example formats provided.

Field.tooltip: Check to show sample settings.
Field.Label: Examples:

- Automatic IP detection (autoip) - City (i.e., CA/San_Francisco, Canada/Toronto) - Latitude/Longitude (i.e., 48.86,2.29 or -33.86,151.22) - ICAO Airport Station (i.e., KORD, CYYZ) - Personal Weather Station (i.e., pws:KMNCHASK10) - US ZIP (i.e., 12345)

Field.Label: Examples:

- Automatic IP detection (autoip) - City (i.e., CA/San_Francisco, Canada/Toronto) - Latitude/Longitude (i.e., 48.86,2.29 or -33.86,151.22) - ICAO Airport Station (i.e., KORD, CYYZ) - Personal Weather Station (i.e., pws:KMNCHASK10) - US ZIP (i.e., 12345)
NOTE: you must have a cumulus or anvil plan to obtain hourly forecast data.

Field.tooltip: Check to suppress severe weather alerts for this device only.
Field.Label: Suppress Severe Weather Alerts:
If severe weather alert logging is enabled, checking this box will suppress alerts for this device only.

Field.tooltip: Check to enable daily weather summary email messages.
Field.Label: Receive Email Summary:

Field.tooltip: Check to enable daily weather summary email messages.
Field.Label: Receive Email Summary:

If checked, the plugin will send one email each day with a summary of select weather information. In order to receive the summary, you must enable notifications of plugin updates within the WUnderground plugin settings dialog.
